name: viewsboost-file-converter-dependencies
description: Dependencies required for the comprehensive file conversion system
installation_commands: npm install pdf-lib pdf2pic mammoth docx officegen jspdf
npm install node-7z yauzl yazl archiver unzipper
npm install imagemin imagemin-mozjpeg imagemin-pngquant imagemin-webp gif-encoder heic-convert

system_requirements.ffmpeg: Required for video/audio conversion - install via: brew install ffmpeg (Mac) or apt-get install ffmpeg (Ubuntu)
system_requirements.imagemagick: Optional for advanced image processing - install via: brew install imagemagick
system_requirements.poppler: Required for PDF processing - install via: brew install poppler
system_requirements.ghostscript: Required for PDF/PostScript processing - install via: brew install ghostscript

performance_notes.video_conversion: CPU intensive - consider server-side processing for large files
performance_notes.adobe_formats: Require specialized libraries and may have limitations without Adobe software
performance_notes.browser_limitations: Some conversions work better in Node.js environment
performance_notes.memory_usage: Large files may require streaming and chunked processing
